name: ResQ Food
description: An application for selling food with close expiry date is close.

name: Breath Forum
description: Web based application to create discussion forums between one user and another. There is also a community feature to create a community between users

name: Siramkuy
description: An IoT device automatic sprinkler that will work if the soil is dry.

name: VR Campus Tour
description: VR for campus tours to make the campus orientation period for new students more enjoyable

name: Breath TV
description: Mobile application that contains information about currently showing and popular films. App can add movies to watchlist and can search movie details.

name: Enhancing Water Spinach Cultivation Efficiency through Deep Pipe Irrigation Utilizing IoT Technology
description: Research on the effectiveness of water spinach plant growth using the Siramkuy iot in regular planting techniques and using the deep pipe irrigation technique
